[i]Fire[/i] – {R}{R}, {T}: Luthier, Pyretic Wayfarer deals 3 damage to any target.
[i]Delthea's Hope[/i] – When Luthier dies, if you control a creature named Delthea, exile him from your graveyard. He becomes plotted. [i](You may cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
